extractSpecies.string_process:
process extractSpecies {
	tag "Extracting species of interest from the MAF for ${initMaf}"

	                                                           

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	file(species_list_file) from speciesFile
	file(initMaf) from initMafChannel

	output:
	file("*_species.maf") into speciesMaf

	script:
	  
	                        
	  
	chrom = initMaf.simpleName
	"""
	mafSpeciesSubset ${params.maf_path}${initMaf} ${species_list_file} ${chrom}_species.maf
	"""

}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

directive: tag "Extracting species of interest from the MAF for ${initMaf}"

maskSpeciesOfInterest.string_process:
process maskSpeciesOfInterest {
	tag "Masking ${params.species_of_interest} for ${fname}."

	                                                          

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	file(species_maf) from speciesMafTwo
	val(chrom_bed_path) from chromBedPath

	output:
	file("*.maf") into maskedMaf

	script:
	  
	                       
	  
	fname = species_maf.baseName
	chrom = species_maf.simpleName
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./maf_parse --features ${chrom_bed_path}/${chrom}.bed --mask-features ${params.species_of_interest} ${species_maf} > ${fname}_masked.maf
	"""
}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

callAutosomalConservedElements.string_process:
process callAutosomalConservedElements {
	tag "Identifying conserved loci on ${fname}."

	                                                          

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	file(masked_maf) from maskedMafsAuto

	output:
	file("*_unfilt.bed") into autoPhastConsElements

	script:
	  
	                                                              
	  
	chrom = masked_maf.simpleName
	fname = masked_maf.baseName.split('_')[0]
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./phastCons ${masked_maf} ${params.auto_neutral_model} --rho ${params.rho} --target-coverage ${params.target_coverage} --expected-length ${params.expected_length} --no-post-probs --score --viterbi ${fname}_phastcons_unfilt.bed --seqname ${chrom} -i MAF
	"""
}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

callNonAutosomalConservedElements.string_process:
process callNonAutosomalConservedElements {
	tag "Identifying conserved loci on non-autosomal ${fname}."

	                                                          

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	file(masked_maf) from maskedMafsNonAuto

	output:
	file("*_unfilt.bed") into nonAutoPhastConsElements

	script:
	  
	                                                                 
	  
	fname = masked_maf.baseName.split('_')[0]
	chrom = masked_maf.simpleName
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./phastCons ${masked_maf} ${params.nonauto_neutral_model}${chrom}.neutral.mod --rho ${params.rho} --target-coverage ${params.target_coverage} --expected-length ${params.expected_length} --no-post-probs --score --viterbi ${fname}_phastcons_unfilt.bed --seqname ${chrom} -i MAF
	"""
}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

filterByScore.string_process:
process filterByScore {
	tag "Filtering phastcons from ${fname} by log odds score"

	input:
	file(phastcons) from phastCons

	output:
	file("*.bed") into phastConsScoreFiltered

	script:
	chrom = phastcons.simpleName
	fname = phastcons.baseName.split('_')[0]
	"""
	python ${baseDir}/bin/score_filter_phastcons.py ${phastcons} ${fname}_phastcons_score_filt.bed ${params.min_decile}
	"""
}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

directive: tag "Filtering phastcons from ${fname} by log odds score"

syntenyFilterPhastCons.string_process:
process syntenyFilterPhastCons {
	tag "Synteny filtering phastCons from ${fname}"

	                                                          

	input:
	file(phastcons) from phastConsScoreFiltered.filter{ it.size()>0 }
	file(synteny_file_list) from syntenyFiles.collect()

	output:
	file("*.bed") into phastConsSyntenyFiltered

	script:
	chrom = phastcons.simpleName
	fname = phastcons.baseName.split('_')[0]
	"""
	bedops -i ${phastcons} ${synteny_file_list} > ${fname}_phastcons_synteny_filt.bed
	"""
}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

tools_dico.name: Bedops
tools_dico.description: BEDOPS is an open-source command-line toolkit that performs efficient and scalable Boolean and other set operations, statistical calculations, archiving, conversion and other management of genomic data of arbitrary scale. Tasks can be easily split by chromosome for distributing whole-genome analyses across a computational cluster.

phastconsDupFilter.string_process:
process phastconsDupFilter {
	tag "Filtering phastCons from ${fname} for repeats, duplicated regions, pseudogenes and selfChain"

	                                                          

	input:
	file(phastcons) from phastConsSyntenyFiltered.filter{ it.size()>0 }
	file(ar_filters) from arFilterFile

	output:
	file("*.bed") into phastConsFiltered

	script:
	chrom = phastcons.simpleName
	fname = phastcons.baseName.split('_')[0]
	"""
	bedtools subtract -a ${phastcons} -b ${ar_filters} | bedtools sort -i - | bedtools merge -d 0 -i - > ${fname}_phastcons_dup_filt.bed
	"""
}
phastconsDupFilter.string_script:
chrom = phastcons.simpleName
	fname = phastcons.baseName.split('_')[0]
	"""
	bedtools subtract -a ${phastcons} -b ${ar_filters} | bedtools sort -i - | bedtools merge -d 0 -i - > ${fname}_phastcons_dup_filt.bed
	"""

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

tools_dico.name: BEDTools
tools_dico.description: BEDTools is an extensive suite of utilities for comparing genomic features in BED format.

directive: tag "Filtering phastCons from ${fname} for repeats, duplicated regions, pseudogenes and selfChain"

phastconsSizeFilter.string_process:
process phastconsSizeFilter {
	tag "Filtering phastCons from ${fname} for size > 50bp"

	                                                          

	input:
	file(phastcons) from phastConsFiltered.filter{ it.size()>0 }

	output:
	file("*.bed") into phastConsSizeFilteredPreID

	script:
	chrom = phastcons
	fname = phastcons.baseName.split('_')[0]
	"""
	awk '(\$3-\$2) >= 50' ${phastcons} > ${fname}_phastcons_size_filt.bed
	"""
}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

accRegionsAutosomal.string_process:
process accRegionsAutosomal {
	tag "Identifying accelerated regions on ${window}"

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	set val(window), file(phastcons), file(species_maf) from phastConsSplitAutoMaf

	output:
	stdout into phyloPResultsAuto

	script:
	  
	                    
	  
	chrom = phastcons.simpleName
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./phyloP --features ${phastcons} --msa-format MAF --method LRT --mode ACC --subtree ${params.species_of_interest} -d ${params.random_seed} -g ${params.auto_neutral_model} ${species_maf}
	"""
}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

tools_dico.name: PhyloPro
tools_dico.description: A web-based tool for the generation and visualization of phylogenetic profiles across Eukarya. It exploits 120 available eukaryotic genome sequences to allow users to visualize the evolutionary trajectories of defined subsets of model organism genes.

accRegionsNonAutosomal.string_process:
process accRegionsNonAutosomal {
	tag "Identifying accelerated regions on ${window}"

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	set val(window), file(phastcons), file(species_maf) from phastConsSplitNonAutoMaf

	output:
	stdout into phyloPResultsNonAuto

	script:
	  
	                    
	  
	chrom = phastcons.simpleName
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./phyloP --features ${phastcons} --msa-format MAF --method LRT --mode ACC --subtree ${params.species_of_interest} -d ${params.random_seed} -g ${params.nonauto_neutral_model}${chrom}.neutral.mod ${species_maf}
	"""

}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

tools_dico.name: PhyloPro
tools_dico.description: A web-based tool for the generation and visualization of phylogenetic profiles across Eukarya. It exploits 120 available eukaryotic genome sequences to allow users to visualize the evolutionary trajectories of defined subsets of model organism genes.

multipleTestCorrectionFiltering.string_process:
process multipleTestCorrectionFiltering {
	tag "Multiple test correction and filtering"

	publishDir params.outdir, mode: "copy", overwrite: true

	input:
	file(scored_phastcons) from phastConsScored

	output:
	file("final_ARs_${params.random_seed}.bed")
	file("scored_phastCons_${params.random_seed}.txt")

	script:
	"""
	python ${baseDir}/bin/multiple_test_correction_filtering.py ${scored_phastcons} ${params.max_p} final_ARs_${params.random_seed}.bed scored_phastCons_${params.random_seed}.txt
	"""

}

extract4dCodons.string_process:
process extract4dCodons {
	tag "Extracting 4D codons for ${chrom}"

	                                                          

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	file(maf) from speciesMaf

	output:
	file("*_4dcodons.ss") into fourDCodons

	script:
	   
	                      
	  
	chrom = maf.simpleName.split('_')[0]
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./msa_view --in-format MAF --out-format SS --4d --features ${params.gtf_path}/${chrom}_refseq_genes_hg38.gtf ${maf} > ${chrom}_4dcodons.ss
	"""

}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

extract4dSites.string_process:
process extract4dSites{
	tag "Extracting 4D sites for ${chrom}"

	                                                          

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	file(codons) from fourDCodons

	output:
	file("*_4dsites.ss") into fourDSites

	script:
	  
	                      
	  
	chrom = codons.simpleName.split('_')[0]
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./msa_view --in-format SS --out-format SS --tuple-size 1 ${codons} > ${chrom}_4dsites.ss
	"""

}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

aggregateAutosome4dSites.string_process:
process aggregateAutosome4dSites {
	tag "Aggregating 4d sites from autosomes"

	                                                          

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	val(species_list) from speciesList
	val(auto_ss_files) from fourDSitesAuto.collect()

	output:
	file("autosomes_4dsites.ss") into autoFourDSitesAgg

	script:
	  
	                      
	  
	ss_file_list = auto_ss_files.collect{"$it"}.join(",")
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./msa_view --unordered-ss --out-format SS --aggregate ${species_list} ${ss_file_list} > autosomes_4dsites.ss
	"""

}

pruneTree.string_process:
process pruneTree {
	tag "Pruning the species tree"

	                                                           

	input:
	file(tree) from initTree
	val(species_list) from speciesList

	output:
	file("pruned_tree.nh") into prunedTree

	script:
	   
	                         
	  
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./tree_doctor -P ${species_list} ${tree} > pruned_tree.nh
	"""
}

neutralModelAutosomes.string_process:
process neutralModelAutosomes {
	tag "Generating neutral model for autosomes"

	                                                          

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input: 
	file(tree) from prunedTree
	file(four_d_sites) from autoFourDSitesAgg

	output:
	file('autosomes_neutral_model_prelim.mod') into autoNeutralModelPrelim

	script:
	  
	                      
	  
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./phyloFit --tree ${tree} --out-root autosomes_neutral_model_prelim --msa-format SS --EM --seed ${params.random_seed} --log autosomes.log ${four_d_sites}
	"""
}

neutralModelNonAutosomes.string_process:
process neutralModelNonAutosomes {
	tag "Generating neutral models for non-autosomes"

	                                                          

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	file(tree) from prunedTree
	file(four_d_sites) from fourDSitesNonAuto

	output:
	file('*_neutral_model_prelim.mod') into nonAutoNeutralModelPrelim

	script:
	  
	                      
	  
	chrom = four_d_sites.simpleName.split('_')[0]
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./phyloFit --tree ${tree} --out-root ${chrom}_neutral_model_prelim --msa-format SS --EM --seed ${params.random_seed} --log ${chrom}.log ${four_d_sites}
	"""

}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

modifyAutoBaseFrequencies.string_process:
process modifyAutoBaseFrequencies {
	tag "Modifying base frequencies of neutral models for autosomes"

	publishDir params.outdir, mode: "copy", overwrite: true

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	file(prelim_neutral_model) from autoNeutralModelPrelim

	output:
	file("autosomes.mod") into autoNeutralModel

	script:
	  
	                      
	  
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./modFreqs ${prelim_neutral_model} 0.3 0.2 0.2 0.3 > autosomes.mod
	"""
}
directive: tag "Modifying base frequencies of neutral models for autosomes"

modifyNonAutoBaseFrequencies.string_process:
process modifyNonAutoBaseFrequencies {
	tag "Modifying base frequencies of neutral models for non-autosome ${chrom} "

	publishDir params.outdir, mode: "copy", overwrite: true

	errorStrategy 'retry'
	maxRetries 3

	input:
	file(prelim_neutral_model) from nonAutoNeutralModelPrelim

	output:
	file("*.mod") into nonAutoNeutralModels

	script:
	  
	                      
	  
	chrom = prelim_neutral_model.simpleName.split('_')[0]
	"""
	${params.phast_path}./modFreqs ${prelim_neutral_model} 0.2 0.3 0.3 0.2 > ${chrom}.mod
	"""
}

tools_dico.name: Chromas
tools_dico.description: Chromas is a low-cost chromatogram file editor with search, vector sequence detection and multi-format sequence export functions, plus powerful batch processing.

directive: tag "Modifying base frequencies of neutral models for non-autosome ${chrom} "
